song.title: Da pacem cordium
song.lyrics:
# Da pacem cordium. Da pacem cordium. Pacem, pacem.
# Donne la paix du coeur. Donne la paix.
# Dona la pace del cuore. Dona la pace.
# Give peace of our hearts. Give peace.
# Gib Frieden des Herzens. Gib Frieden.
# Daj pokój serca.
# Даруй мир сердцам нашим.
